verification.subject: Verify your email address - Translide
verification.verification_intro: Thank you for registering with Translide. To complete your registration and start using our PowerPoint translation service, please verify your email address.
verification.button_fallback: If the button doesn't work, you can copy and paste this link into your browser:
verification.expires_note: This link will expire in 24 hours.
verification.ignore_note: If you didn't create an account with Translide, you can safely ignore this email.

errors.missing_token: No verification token provided. Please check the link in your email.
errors.invalid_token: Invalid verification token. Please request a new verification email.
errors.token_expired: This verification link has expired. Please request a new verification email.
errors.verification_cooldown: Please wait 2 minutes before requesting another verification email

reset_password.subject: Reset your password - Translide
reset_password.reset_intro: We received a request to reset your password for your Translide account.
reset_password.button_fallback: If the button doesn't work, you can copy and paste this link into your browser:
reset_password.expires_note: This link will expire in 1 hour.
reset_password.ignore_note: If you didn't request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email.
